name: Curve.fi cyDAI/cyUSDC/cyUSDT
description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains DAI, USDC, and USDT that are lent out to the Iron Bank, a decentralized money market on Ethereum launched collaboratively by C.R.E.A.M. Finance and Yearn Finance.

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains DAI, USDC, and USDT that are lent out to the Iron Bank, a decentralized money market on Ethereum launched collaboratively by C.R.E.A.M. Finance and Yearn Finance.

fr.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains DAI, USDC, and USDT that are lent out to the Iron Bank, a decentralized money market on Ethereum launched collaboratively by C.R.E.A.M. Finance and Yearn Finance.

es.description: Este token representa un grupo de liquidez de Curve. Los titulares obtienen tarifas de los usuarios que comercian en el grupo y también pueden depositar el LP en los gauges de Curve para obtener emisiones de CRV. Este grupo contiene DAI, USDC y USDT que se prestan al Iron Bank, un mercado monetario descentralizado en Ethereum lanzado en colaboración por C.R.E.A.M. Finanzas y Yearn Finance.

tr.description: Bu jeton, bir Curve likidite havuzunu temsil eder. Sahipler, havuzda işlem yapan kullanıcılardan ücret alır ve ayrıca CRV emisyonları kazanmak için LP'yi Curve'un göstergelerine yatırabilir. Bu havuz, C.R.E.A.M. tarafından ortaklaşa başlatılan Ethereum üzerinde merkezi olmayan bir para piyasası olan Iron Bank'a ödünç verilen DAI, USDC ve USDT'yi içerir. Finance ve Yearn Finance.

vi.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains DAI, USDC, and USDT that are lent out to the Iron Bank, a decentralized money market on Ethereum launched collaboratively by C.R.E.A.M. Finance and Yearn Finance.

zh.description: 此代币是 Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者可以赚取交易费，也可以将代币存入 Curve gauge 以获得 CRV 奖励。其中包含存入 Iron Bank 的 DAI, USDC, USDT。Iron Bank 是由 C.R.E.A.M. Finance 和 Yearn Finance 合作推出在以太坊上的去中心化货币市场。
